topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546ad5cc6368727b33d20100#post_546ad5cc6368727b33d20100
Looking on the EVAgeeks wiki.

The only things that pierced through the AT field that wasn't explicitly caused by another AT Field was the positron rifle and the lance of Longinus
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546ad7356368720b01160200#post_546ad7356368720b01160200

It also states that the strenght of the AT Field, is like I said, level of synchronization of the pilots, plus the energy input of the entry plug.

So, in order for the Unit-01 to get the best of the barrier, Shinji needs to have good synchronization, plus been plugged to the cord. Every time the Unit goes berserk, it tends to unplug which means his defensive capabilities are reduced but the raw power gives a minor compensation, in other words, Unit-01 becomes a Glass Cannon for as long as they are on that state.
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4
